 2012-16302012-12-06HRSDC,  TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made under the Canada Labour Code
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADA LABOUR CODE in order to (1) facilitate the delivery of first-aid training to employees of the federal jurisdiction; and (2) address outstanding concerns of the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0271 Publication Date: 2012-12-19
